SmartFieldSpec.Name: Has Cash Child Sponsorship Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: The constituent has at least one cash child sponsorship. True if any active child sponsorship is paid with cash.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_HASCHILDSPONSORSHIPONEFTFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date
select distinct c.ID, 1 from dbo.CONSTITUENT c join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD rpaymethod on rpaymethod.REVENUEID = rsplit.REVENUEID where s.STATUSCODE = 1 and rpaymethod.PAYMENTMETHODCODE in (0, 1, 9) -- Cash, Check, None
